column5: I have a friend that is looking for a fishing camp owned by Native Canadians on Lac Suel. Is there such a place? If so which part of the lake is it on?
I know of two: 1) Mahkwa lodge out of Hudon. www.mahkwa.com 2) Lac Seul Resort closer to SiouLookout.www.fishlacseul.com/location
Sorry Lac Seul Resort is at www.lacseulresort.com.
Why? This is discriminatory, of course.
>Why? >This is discriminatory, of course. it's not discriminatory, check out www.mahkwa.com mahkoons is beside mahkwa owned by local person and has two units
